description: This file defines the InfraResources class, which manages groups of InfraResource and InfraApp objects, including methods for creating, deleting, updating, and saving resources. It also imports a base class from another module.

classes.name: InfraResources
classes.description: A class representing a collection of infrastructure resources, providing methods to manage them.

methods.name: create_resources
methods.description: Method to create resources with optional filters and flags; not implemented in this class.

methods.name: delete_resources
methods.description: Method to delete resources with optional filters and flags; not implemented in this class.

methods.name: update_resources
methods.description: Method to update resources with optional filters and flags; not implemented in this class.

methods.name: save_resources
methods.description: Method to save resources with optional filters; not implemented in this class.
